channel.title: pandas on Miguel Aspis's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in pandas on Miguel Aspis's Portfolio

item.title: Basic Image Classification
item.description: Basic Image classification A project done using a simple CNN architecture to do image classification on the CIFAR-10 dataset. Steps of the process include: Importing the data One-hot enconding it Defining 1st basic CNN using Keras high-level Sequential API Training and evaluating Defining a bit bigger model Training and evaluating Comparing both and concluding more can be read on the project’s github repo

item.title: Uber data visualization
item.description: Data visualization project on dataset with uber trips data on New York city in the year 2014. Some interesting information could be gathered regarding costumer’s habits and patterns. One of such visualizations can be seen here: More of these can be seen on the github repo
